last_episode_to_air.name: Once Upon a Time on Mars (3)
last_episode_to_air.overview: The Biker Mice retell the stories of how Modo got his arm, Vinnie his mask, Throttle his eyes, and a betrayal that resulted in the disappearance of a friend.

name: Biker Mice from Mars
overview: Biker Mice from Mars is a science fiction action animated series created by Rick Ungar that began airing in 1993 in the United States and lasted for three seasons before it was cancelled. It follows three anthropomorphic mice motorcyclists named Throttle, Modo, and Vinnie who escape a war on their home planet Mars before arriving to defend the Earth from the evil that destroyed their homeland and to one day return to Mars. The mice's signature weapons consist of a cestus and a laser, a bionic arm, and flares. Despite the frequent battles, no blood is shown, no firearms are used and many villains are monsters, aliens, and robots. These elements allowed the show to still be considered suitable for children.

episodes.name: Rock and Ride!
episodes.overview: Throttle, Modo and Vinnie...The Biker Mice from Mars...escape their planet as it it devastated by the fish faced plutarkians. Crashlanding in Chicago, the renegade rodents soon discover the Plutarkians next target: EARTH. Led by his supreme chessiness, Lawrence Limburger, and his devilish cohorts, Greasepit and the fiendish Dr. Karbunkle, the Plutarkians are already undermining the Windy City. It's tail whippin' time 'cause the baddest motorcycle mammajammers in the universe are riding to the rescue.

episodes.name: The Reeking Reign of the Head Cheese (1)
episodes.overview: Limburger frames the mayor's kidnapping on the Biker Mice, so he can take over the city.

episodes.name: The Reeking Reign of the Head Cheese (2)
episodes.overview: The Biker Mice have to work double time to clear their names and save the mayor before Chief of Police Greasepit catches them.

episodes.name: We Don't Need No Stinkin' City
episodes.overview: Limburger receives help from the Lugie Brothers, who are part of the Scum of the Universe. They must fumigate the city in an attempt to drive the citizens of Chicago out of town.

episodes.name: A Mouse and His Motorcycle
episodes.overview: When Modo is covered in toxic substances, Limburger escapes with his bike. Modo does not want to rest while Charley and the guys rescue his bike.

episodes.name: Test of Friendship
episodes.overview: Limburger hires Evil Eye Weevil to reign chaos on the town, causing mischief and mayhem and succeeds in driving the trio apart.

episodes.name: The Masked Motorcyclist
episodes.overview: A mysterious female biker is in town, helping out the three mice, while Limburger accepts help from Corroder Cody, who will help him purloin crude oil.

episodes.name: The Pits
episodes.overview: The Biker Mice realize that Limburger is not the only evil character in town, when they attempt to stop a bank robbery. Vinnie must descend into the Pits to save his brothers from the Pit Boss.

episodes.name: Road Ravens
episodes.overview: Two of the Biker Mice are injured when a new gang arrived in town, and stole all the gas.

episodes.name: A Scent, a Memory, a Far Distant Cheese
episodes.overview: When Limburger disappears mysteriously, his unintentional replacements turn out to be increasingly more powerful and evil.

episodes.name: Steelfinger
episodes.overview: In order to steal all the steel from the town, Limburger offers Modo a new arm to work for him.

episodes.name: Chill Zone
episodes.overview: The Biker Mice must stop Limburger's plan to ruin not only Christmas, but winter too, and save an orphanage.

episodes.name: Hard Rock
episodes.overview: The Heavy Metal mouse that the mice despised on Mars, heads into Chicago, but with an all-new attitude.

episodes.name: Steal of the Century
episodes.overview: With the Pulverizer on his side, Limburger decides to steal the newest piece of military destructive weaponry.

episodes.name: We're Going to Cheesyland
episodes.overview: When a new theme park opens - Cheesyland, Limburger decides to hide his mining operations there, so it's up to the guys to make sure that Cheesyland doesn't leave the Windy City full of holes.

episodes.name: Stone Broke
episodes.overview: After losing his funding, Limburger has a wonderfully devious plan to get back in the High Chairman's good graces, and this leads the mice and Charley in a race to save a national monument.

episodes.name: The Motor City Maniac
episodes.overview: Limburger's old Plutarkian rival, Napoleon Brie arrives on Earth to try and take over operations.

episodes.name: Upwardly Mobile
episodes.overview: Limburger's new plan is to literally cut the city free from the Earth and eject it to Plutark.

episodes.name: Last Stand at Last Chance
episodes.overview: The mice and Charley must race to save the Last Chance when Limburger manages to get the building legally condemned.

episodes.name: Back to Mars (1)
episodes.overview: When the Biker Mice finally capture Limburger, they must return with him to Mars to face trial. They discover that they are also thrown in prison for treason. The Mice have to escape and save Charley from Greasepit and Karbunkle while claiming that they have not done anything wrong.

episodes.name: Back to Mars (2)
episodes.overview: The Mice must now face Limburger's latest machine from annihilating Mars. The machine attracts asteroids to the planet, to bring complete destruction.

episodes.name: Back to Mars (3)
episodes.overview: They still have to roost Napoleon Brie from Chicago where he's taken over in Limburger and the mice's absence.

episodes.name: The Tribunal
episodes.overview: The mice are put on trial for their crimes against Limburger.

episodes.name: Motocross Trap
episodes.overview: Limburger decides to lure the Biker Mice into a trap that will put them against several villains. This would make Limburger gain access to Vinnie's Motocross title as the prize.

episodes.name: Unforgiven Cheese
episodes.overview: A female bounty hunter is present in the Windy City, ready to defeat some evil.

episodes.name: Bleu Cheese Bros
episodes.overview: When, Limburger takes over as warden for a prison, Charley and the Mice find out a way to stop him, by trying to get into jail.

episodes.name: The Inquisition
episodes.overview: When the Plutarkian leaders are furious with Limburger for failing to capture the Last Chance Garage, he must prove himself worthy.

episodes.name: Stalkers
episodes.overview: When intergalactic game hunters catch Modo's nephew Rimfire, he manages to escape in their ship and finds himself on Earth.

episodes.name: I, Greasepit
episodes.overview: Limburger's incompetence finally lands him a demotion from the High Chairman. When the High Chairman appoints Greasepit in his place, he is able to capture The Last Chance garage.

episodes.name: Villain of the Year
episodes.overview: Limburger invites tonnes of the evil creatures to a convention to hold the Villain of the Year awards. And the prize would be the Biker Mice From Mars.

episodes.name: Cheeseloggers
episodes.overview: Limburger uses the gene scrambler to steal trees, while Karbunkle and Fred are caught in the gene scramblers rays and are scrambled together.

episodes.name: Hickory Dickory Doc
episodes.overview: The mice must travel back to the time of the dinosaurs to keep Chicago from disappearing before it was ever built.

episodes.name: Die Fledermice
episodes.overview: The Mice and Charley must travel to Kansas to stop Limburger from stealing all the grain from the nation's breadbasket.

episodes.name: Law of the Pits
episodes.overview: The Pit Boss is back with a new friend, framed for a crime he did not do, while the Pit Boss captures Charley.

episodes.name: Danger Is Our Business
episodes.overview: The mice are cast as stuntmen for a film, shooting in the local area, but problems with the star and the director, healthy plans for the filming locations make for a dangerous day on the job.

episodes.name: Mad Scientist Wanted
episodes.overview: Charley and Karbunkle get whisked away when execs for a galactic company try to convince their boss that their pick is the better scientist.

episodes.name: Lake Michi-Gone
episodes.overview: Limburgers decide to take all the water of Lake Michigan to pollute and send to Plutark as designer water.

episodes.name: Seeds of Victory
episodes.overview: Throttle's ladylove lands in Chicago to steal the last remaining specimen of a plant that is desperately needed for the Martian ecology to survive.

episodes.name: Pwetty Wady
episodes.overview: Limburger finds himself in an interesting situation when a run-in leaves him with an admirer - Napoleon Brie.

episodes.name: My Cheese Is Quick
episodes.overview: Charley is thrown in jail for the murder of Limburger, which never occurred.

episodes.name: Verminator
episodes.overview: Modo's arm has to be replaced, but things get weird when Vinnie's plan backfires and Karbunkle creates an evil robot based on Vinnie, including his ego and knowledge.

episodes.name: Cheese Cadets
episodes.overview: Limburger's minions go on strike.

episodes.name: So Life Like
episodes.overview: Karbunkle has a wonderful machine that can remove comic book characters from their pages, and Limburger decides that the best way to defeat the mice is with evil versions of themselves.

episodes.name: Garbage Wars
episodes.overview: Limburger disrupts Chicago's garbage service in order to bomb Chicago with stink bombs. He brings the scum of the universe back as his villains of choice for the task.

episodes.name: Vicious Cycles
episodes.overview: Limburger's latest villain manages to infect the mice's bikes, making them turn on their riders.

episodes.name: Cycle Centaurs
episodes.overview: Limburger produces villains using DNA from the Mice and combines it with material from their bikes, when he makes a new theme park.

episodes.name: Modo Hangs It Up
episodes.overview: Limburger has the unpleasant task of baby-sitting his nephew, who he manages to figure into his latest plan.

episodes.name: What Smells Worse Than a Plutarkian Lawyer?
episodes.overview: Provolene, a Plutarkian lawyer is involved with getting the Mice's bikes impounded, while the Mice must stop a meltdown at the local nuclear reactor thanks to lawyer.

episodes.name: Below The Horizon
episodes.overview: The guys manage to mess up the launch of Limburger's satellite, but must race Limburger to the North Pole to retrieve it and destroy it before Limburger can find it and get it in orbit.

episodes.name: Big Trouble
episodes.overview: Dr. Karbunkle creates an inflation machine, which turns Greasepit into a giant. His perspective of Charley in a pile of Grease makes him fall in love with her. He brings her flowers, reads poetry to her, but she refuses at the end.

episodes.name: Academy of Hard Knocks
episodes.overview: Limburger hires a whole new bunch of goons, but before he can send them after Brie, he has to train them first.

episodes.name: High Rollin' Rodents
episodes.overview: When Limburger opens a new casino island, the Biker Mice needs to travel there to beat him at his own game when he uses less than honest means to win the land from many Chicago citizens.

episodes.name: Biker Knights of the Round Table (1)
episodes.overview: The Biker Mice From Mars must travel back to King Arthur's time, and stop Lumburger from stealing half of England, and destroying Camelot.

episodes.name: Biker Knights of the Round Table (2)
episodes.overview: The Biker Mice From Mars must travel back to King Arthur's time, and stop Lumburger from stealing half of England, and destroying Camelot.

episodes.name: Virtual Unreality
episodes.overview: Asphalt Jack McCyber, an old friend of Charley's arrive in Chicago, with an incredibly unique virtual helmet that Limburger is determined to take.

episodes.name: Pitfall
episodes.overview: On the way to Earth with proof that Lord Camembert is embezzling Plutarkian funds, Provolone's ship malfunctions and he lands in the Pits where the mice meet up with Four-By to fight the Pit Boss and get rid of Provolone.

episodes.name: Diet of Worms
episodes.overview: The Mice have to deal with a meeting in Chicago of several of the largest Plutarkian bosses on earth and stop a Plutarkian invasion.

episodes.name: Rocketh and Rideth
episodes.overview: Limburger uses Karbunkle's newest machine to steal the land from fictional places in Shakespeare's plays. This resulted in the destruction of the plays, and they ceased to exist. So, the Biker Mice must enter the well-known stories to stop him, but first Charley must convince them that Shakespeare is worth saving.

episodes.name: Too Many Limburgers Spoil the Cheese
episodes.overview: Karbunkle's latest invention duplicates multiple Limburgers.

episodes.name: Hit the Road, Jack
episodes.overview: Asphalt Jack returns to Chicago to visit Charley and friends with his fiancÃ©, but the visit turns sour when Jack and his new cyber bike are captured and the guys must rescue him while Limburger and Brie deal with a quadruple, triple, double agent who has deals with more then just the two Plutarkians.

episodes.name: Caveat Mentor
episodes.overview: While Rimfire and Stoker arrive on earth with a typical Martian male landing, Limburger creates a new scheme to brainwash everyone using shampoo. But the Mice are in trouble when Stoker seems to have lost his fighting abilities.

episodes.name: Where No Mouse Has Gone Before
episodes.overview: The Biker Mice have been mysteriously transported to Plutark with a bunch of scrap metal from a local junkyard. This turns out to be a good thing for Limburger and he uses it to give himself a shot at being elected High Chairman.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time on Mars (1)
episodes.overview: Limburger is ready to use a new device, a Tug Transformer, to bring Earth into orbit of Plutark.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time on Mars (2)
episodes.overview: Limburger is about to make Earth one of the newest moons of Plutark as the Biker Mice reveal to Charley about the time they dealt with the same problem back on Mars.

episodes.name: Once Upon a Time on Mars (3)
episodes.overview: The Biker Mice retell the stories of how Modo got his arm, Vinnie his mask, Throttle his eyes, and a betrayal that resulted in the disappearance of a friend.
